mapper.sql: t.uid, t.credit_entity_name, t.credit_entity_code, t.unify_society_code, t.business_license, t.tax_register_number, t.legal_person, t.table_owner_id, t.table_owner_name, t.file_path, t.img_file, t.is_publish, t.ctime, t.creater_id, t.creater, t.etime, t.editor_id, t.editor, t.remarks, t.deleted, t.book_name, t.domain_type, t.order_value, t.content, t.comm_time, t.domain_name
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO commitment_book (
uid,
credit_entity_name , credit_entity_code , unify_society_code , business_license , tax_register_number , legal_person , table_owner_id , table_owner_name , file_path , img_file , is_publish , ctime , creater_id , creater , etime , editor_id , editor , remarks , deleted, book_name, domain_type, order_value, content, comm_time, domain_name ) VALUES (
#{uid},
#{creditEntityName}, #{creditEntityCode}, #{unifySocietyCode}, #{businessLicense}, #{taxRegisterNumber}, #{legalPerson}, #{tableOwnerId}, #{tableOwnerName}, #{filePath}, #{imgFile}, #{isPublish}, now(), #{createrId}, #{creater}, #{etime}, #{editorId}, #{editor}, #{remarks}, 0, #{bookName}, #{domainType}, #{orderValue}, #{content}, #{commTime}, #{domainName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS uid

INSERT INTO wzcredit.commitment_book ( uid, credit_entity_name , credit_entity_code , unify_society_code , business_license , tax_register_number , legal_person , table_owner_id , table_owner_name , file_path , img_file , is_publish , ctime , creater_id , creater , etime , editor_id , editor , remarks , deleted , book_name, domain_type, order_value, content, comm_time, domain_name ) VALUES
( #{item.uid}, #{item.creditEntityName}, #{item.creditEntityCode}, #{item.unifySocietyCode}, #{item.businessLicense}, #{item.taxRegisterNumber}, #{item.legalPerson}, #{item.tableOwnerId}, #{item.tableOwnerName}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.imgFile}, #{item.isPublish}, now(), #{item.createrId}, #{item.creater}, #{item.etime}, #{item.editorId}, #{item.editor}, #{item.remarks}, 0, #{item.bookName}, #{item.domainType}, #{item.orderValue}, #{item.content}, #{item.commTime}, #{item.domainName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE commitment_book
credit_entity_name = #{creditEntityName},
credit_entity_code = #{creditEntityCode},
unify_society_code = #{unifySocietyCode},
business_license = #{businessLicense},
tax_register_number = #{taxRegisterNumber},
legal_person = #{legalPerson},
table_owner_id = #{tableOwnerId},
table_owner_name = #{tableOwnerName},
file_path = #{filePath},
img_file = #{imgFile},
is_publish = #{isPublish},
ctime = #{ctime},
creater_id = #{createrId},
creater = #{creater},
etime = now(),
editor_id = #{editorId},
editor = #{editor},
remarks = #{remarks},
deleted = #{deleted},
book_name = #{bookName},
domain_type = #{domainType},
order_value = #{orderValue},
content = #{content},
domain_name = #{domainName},
WHERE deleted=0 AND uid = #{uid}

update.foreach:
UPDATE commitment_book
credit_entity_name = #{item.creditEntityName},
credit_entity_code = #{item.creditEntityCode},
unify_society_code = #{item.unifySocietyCode},
business_license = #{item.businessLicense},
tax_register_number = #{item.taxRegisterNumber},
legal_person = #{item.legalPerson},
table_owner_id = #{item.tableOwnerId},
table_owner_name = #{item.tableOwnerName},
file_path = #{item.filePath},
img_file = #{item.imgFile},
is_publish = #{item.isPublish},
ctime = #{item.ctime},
creater_id = #{item.createrId},
creater = #{item.creater},
etime = now(),
editor_id = #{item.editorId},
editor = #{item.editor},
remarks = #{item.remarks},
deleted = #{item.deleted},
book_name = #{item.bookName},
domain_type = #{item.domainType},
order_value = #{item.orderValue},
domain_name = #{item.domainName},
WHERE deleted = 0 AND uid = #{item.uid};

mapper.update: UPDATE commitment_book SET deleted = 1, etime = now() WHERE deleted = 0 AND uid = #{value}
mapper.select:
SELECT b.item_value, b.`name` FROM ( SELECT cb.table_owner_id, cb.domain_type FROM wzcredit.commitment_book cb GROUP BY cb.domain_type ) a, rbac.sys_dict b ,rbac.sys_group g WHERE a.domain_type = b.item_value AND a.table_owner_id = g.group_path
AND g.region_id = (SELECT region_id FROM rbac.sys_group WHERE group_id = #{siteId} )
